name: Siteframe Beaumont
body:
**This version of Siteframe has known security vulnerabilities and should not be used in a production environment.**

Access to Siteframe is provided to support users who already have it installed or who wish to maintain it. It is no longer being supported. You can read a history of the development of Siteframe (one of the earliest "Web 2.0" frameworks) [on my blog](http://glenc.co/about/siteframe/).

[Click here for Siteframe V3](http://siteframe.org)

©2003-13 [Glen Campbell](http://glenc.co)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
